promptPrefix:
Please provide a detailed response to the following prompt:
1. Please create a JSON data structure that adheres to the provided JSON Schema.
2. Make sure to include all required fields and ensure the structure is accurate.
3. Once you have created the JSON data, be prepared to make modifications based on my additional instructions.
4. Present the JSON in Markdown code format, without any comments.
The JSON Schema is provided below:
{ "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "title": "Studio call flow meta-schema", "type": "object", "properties": { "id": { "type": "string", "description": "A unique identifier", "pattern": "^[0-9a-f]{32}$" }, "account_id": { "type": "string", "description": "Account identifier, the identifier of the account to which this record belongs.", "pattern": "^[0-9a-fA-F]{24}$" }, "user_id": { "type": "string", "description": "User identifier, the identifier of the user who created this record.", "pattern": "^[0-9a-fA-F]{24}$" }, "name": { "type": "string", "description": "Name, usually representing a human-readable title or name for this record." }, "description": { "type": "string", "description": "Detailed description or additional information about this record." }, "trigger_type": { "type": "string", "description": "Trigger type, indicating the manner or condition under which this record is triggered.", "enum": [ "voice_inbound", "voice_outbound", "livechat_inbound", "message_inbound" ] }, "status": { "type": "string", "description": "Status, indicating the current status of this record, such as 'published'.", "enum": ["draft", "published", "available", "archived"] }, "version": { "type": "integer", "description": "Version number, the version identifier of this record." }, "previous_version": { "type": "string", "description": "Identifier of the previous version, pointing to the prior version of this record." }, "created_at": { "type": "string", "format": "date-time", "description": "Creation time, the date and time when the record was created." }, "updated_at": { "type": "string", "format": "date-time", "description": "Update time, the date and time when the record was last updated." }, "valid": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Validity flag, indicating whether this record is valid." }, "validation_status": { "type": "string", "description": "Validation status, showing the validation status of this record, such as 'valid'.", "enum": ["valid", "error", "unknown"] }, "initial_step_id": { "type": "string", "description": "Initial step identifier, pointing to the initial step in the process.", "pattern": "^[0-9a-f]{32}$" }, "group_id": { "type": "string", "description": "Group identifier, the identifier of the group or category to which this record belongs." }, "pre_conditions": { "type": "object", "description": "Pre-conditions, defining conditions that must be met for this record to be valid." }, "steps": { "type": "array", "description": "A list of steps in a process, each representing a specific action or task.", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "id": { "type": "string", "description": "Unique identifier for the step.", "pattern": "^[0-9a-f]{32}$" }, "name": { "type": "string", "description": "Human-readable name for the step." }, "component": { "type": "object", "description": "Details of the component used in this step.", "oneOf": [ { "properties": { "name": { "const": "inbound_voice-ZjE1ZjM0MG" }, "version": { "const": "1.3.x" } }, "description": "Initial component for the inbound voice, must as the first step in the flow." }, { "properties": { "name": { "const": "assignment_and_dial-M2JhZTViYT" }, "version": { "const": "3.23.x" } }, "description": "A component related to assigning and dialing" }, { "properties": { "name": { "const": "hangup_call-OTE5ZmM0NW" }, "version": { "const": "1.0.x" } }, "description": "A component for terminating calls" }, { "properties": { "name": { "const": "voicemail-NGQ0ZDE5Nj" }, "version": { "const": "2.4.x" } }, "description": "A component for managing voicemail functionalities" } ], "required": ["name", "version"] }, "properties": { "type": "object", "description": "A set of properties and configurations for the step." }, "exits": { "type": "array", "description": "Possible exit points or outcomes from this step.", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "_key": { "type": "string", "description": "A UUID identifying the exit, following the UUID format.", "pattern": "^[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-fA-F]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-fA-F]{3}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}$" }, "name": { "type": "string", "description": "Name of the exit." }, "transition": { "type": "string", "description": "Identifier of the step to transition to after this exit.", "pattern": "^[0-9a-f]{32}$" } }, "required": ["_key", "name", "transition"] } }, "context_mappings": { "type": "object", "description": "Mappings of context variables for this step", "default": {} }, "created_at": { "type": "string", "format": "date-time", "description": "The date and time when the step was created." } }, "required": [ "id", "name", "component", "properties", "exits", "context_mappings", "created_at" ], "allOf": [ { "if": { "properties": { "component": { "properties": { "name": { "const": "inbound_voice-ZjE1ZjM0MG" } } } } }, "then": { "properties": { "exits": { "type": "array", "minItems": 1, "maxItems": 1, "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "name": { "const": "ok" } }, "required": ["name"] } } } } }, { "if": { "properties": { "component": { "properties": { "name": { "enum": ["hangup_call-OTE5ZmM0NW", "voicemail-NGQ0ZDE5Nj"] } } } } }, "then": { "properties": { "exits": { "maxItems": 0 } } } }, { "if": { "properties": { "component": { "properties": { "name": { "const": "assignment_and_dial-M2JhZTViYT" } } } } }, "then": { "properties": { "properties": { "type": "object", "properties": { "priority": { "type": "object", "properties": { "priorities_list": { "type": "integer", "default": 10 } }, "description": "Define the priority for this assignment request.", "required": ["priorities_list"] }, "time_limit": { "type": "object", "properties": { "time": { "type": "integer", "default": 30 }, "waiting_music": { "type": "object" } }, "description": "Maximum time to find the configured assignment.", "required": ["time"] }, "users_to_ring": { "type": "object", "properties": { "exhaust": { "type": "boolean" }, "forced_queueing": { "type": "boolean" }, "number_of_users": { "type": "integer" } }, "required": [ "exhaust", "forced_queueing", "number_of_users" ] }, "waiting_message": { "type": "object" }, "assignment_parameters": { "type": "object", "oneOf": [ { "properties": { "ring_groups": { "type": "object", "properties": { "ring_groups_list": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } } }, "required": ["ring_groups_list"] } }, "required": ["ring_groups"], "additionalProperties": false }, { "properties": { "agents": { "type": "object", "properties": { "agents_list": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } } }, "required": ["agents_list"] } }, "required": ["agents"], "additionalProperties": false } ] } }, "required": [ "priority", "time_limit", "users_to_ring", "assignment_parameters" ] }, "exits": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "object", "properties": { "name": { "enum": [ "call_finished", "call_no_answer", "time_limit_reached", "no_match" ] } }, "required": ["name"] } } } } }, { "if": { "properties": { "component": { "properties": { "name": { "const": "voicemail-NGQ0ZDE5Nj" } } } } }, "then": { "properties": { "properties": { "type": "object", "properties": { "record_parameters": { "type": "object", "oneOf": [ { "properties": { "with_transcription_max_duration": { "type": "integer", "default": 120 } }, "required": ["with_transcription_max_duration"], "additionalProperties": false, "description": "Transcribe to English" }, { "properties": { "without_transcription_max_duration": { "type": "integer", "default": 300 } }, "required": ["without_transcription_max_duration"], "additionalProperties": false, "description": "Do not transcribe" } ], "description": "Transcribe or not with Max duration in seconds." }, "assignment_parameters": { "type": "object", "oneOf": [ { "properties": { "ring_groups": { "type": "object", "properties": { "ring_groups_list": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } } }, "required": ["ring_groups_list"] } }, "required": ["ring_groups"], "additionalProperties": false }, { "properties": { "agents": { "type": "object", "properties": { "agents_list": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } } }, "required": ["agents_list"] } }, "required": ["agents"], "additionalProperties": false } ] } }, "required": [ "record_parameters", "assignment_parameters" ] } } } } ] }, "minItems": 1 } }, "required": [ "id", "name", "description", "trigger_type", "status", "version", "created_at", "updated_at", "valid", "validation_status", "initial_step_id", "steps" ] }
title: ChatterBox
